QuestData.Title: Victory in Wintergrasp
QuestData.Description: While Dardosh might be content with slaying our foes, it is of the utmost importance that we control Wintergrasp Fortress. Do whatever it takes to ensure Wintergrasp is ours.$B$BHowever, don't think we'll just let you stand around while your allies do your dirty work for you. If you're not at least a second level recruit by the end of the battle, don't come back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Win a Wintergrasp battleground match and return to Tactical Officer Kilrath in Wintergrasp. You must have participated in the battle to gain credit for the victory.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tactical Officer Kilrath in Wintergrasp.
QuestData.RewardText: It is a truly great thing you have accomplished this day. Be recognized for your sacrifice!
